page.title: 16NAIRN:LOCAL SHOP
page.content: The only local shop in our area is the Spar.The owner is Mr G Jarden.The shop is open every day apart from Sunday.It openS from 8.30-1.00 and from 2.00 to 6.00. The shop has to serve a large area of housing although most people in Achareidh find it as convenient to go to the High Street. The shop supplies a large range of goods from newspapers and hardware to grceries and meat. Few people do thier main shopping here (many go to the large stores in Inverness) but most locals visit at least once a week. For those who cannot easily get elsewhere e.g. the old, it saves a long walk to the town centre especially in cold or wet weather. Many people meet at the shop and it is a useful focus for the community both young and old.
